clinical_history: Limb swelling, rule out deep venous thrombosis.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Liver appears mildly thickened with no focal lesions.
Testes are unremarkable with normal vascularity.
Left ovary demonstrates mildly heterogeneous morphology.
Breast tissue shows mildly thickened lesion measuring 35.67 mm.
Right kidney demonstrates hyperechoic, no hydronephrosis.
